import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Cart = ({ cart, addToCart, removeFromCart, clearCart }) => { const [deliveryMethod, setDeliveryMethod] = useState('nova-poshta'); const deliveryPrices = { 'nova-poshta': 100, ems: 100, courier: 120, }; const subtotal = cart.reduce( (sum, item) => sum + parseFloat(item.price) * item.quantity, 0 ); const deliveryCost = deliveryPrices[deliveryMethod] || 0; const total = subtotal + deliveryCost; return (

); }; export default Cart;
